name: CrabKoin (CRBK)
description: CrabKoin is here with it's Claws out. Ready to dominate the Blockchain market & bridge the gap between Blockchain & Retail. With futuristic use cases such as Shop to Earn, Redeem & Recharge, and Win Big With Shopping Rewards, you cannot go wrong in getting some CrabKoins (CRBK) in your bag. CrabKoin will introduce the following use cases in Retail & Ecommerce: * Shop & Earn: Every swipe of your virtual card nets you CRBK, watch your Blockchain pile stack with each purchase.
